gw.solr.request

Class AbstractIndexDocument

  • gw.solr.request.AbstractIndexDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class AbstractIndexDocument
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Represents a Solr document (or the key thereof). A row in a Solr index, if you will.
